Plot: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.
Title: Kinky Boots
Actors: Joel Edgerton, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Sarah-Jane Potts, Nick Frost
tomatoConsensus: Kinky Boots relies heavily on the Full Monty formula of Britcoms, while playing it too safe in a desperate attempt not to offend. Ejiofor's performance is its redeeming virtue.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
